title: I Build The Cheapest AMD Gaming PC From AliExpressâ€¦
description: *Video Sponsor is DeepCool and their new CH160 mini-ITX case. Links to the case are below!   I built an all AMD AM5 gaming PC using only parts from Aliexpress and it did NOT go well.  Thank you DeepCool. Check out the new mini-ITX cases. CH160:  CH160 WH:   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Akamai (previously Linode)! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
